Name: Crazy Christmas
About the game: Arcade Racing Game, Single Player, Drive for Score, Drive for Fun. You are Ethan! a former felony convicted who needs to deliver the cargo in time for christmas eve. Drive through the city with no morale but beware, The cops are hunting you! Good Luck!
